name: Glassharbor
role_in_state: specialist port for glassware, auguries and ship repair
economy_niches: lens & crystal manufacture for navigational auguries
culture_adjustments: stronger guild monopoly over craft and trade
harbor-kin clans dominate apprenticeships and crew assignments
stricter pilot hospitality protocols and vetting
constraints: glass furnaces constrained by imported fuel/reagent quotas
ritual consumables scarce and tightly controlled
notes: regional centre for navigational lenses and augury spheres
kiln-works built into coastal cliffs to shield from storms
